name: 通訊原理（一）
description: This course provides the knowledge of fundamental communication systems for students majoring in applied electronic technology. The course covers Random Process, Continuous-Wave Modulation, Pulse Modulation, Baseband Pulse Transmission, Signal-Space Analysis, and Passband Digital Transmission.
goals: 學習訊號處理與通訊系統之基本理論模式
瞭解通訊系統的技術知識
建立通訊系統設計的基本觀念與技術
syllabus:
1\. Random process (3 weeks)

第1週 Probability and Random Variables

第2週 Random Processes and Spectral Analysis

第3週 Transformations and Operations on Random Processes

2\. Continuous-Wave Modulation (3 weeks)

第4週 Analog Modulation

第5週 Superheterodyne Receiver

第6週 Noise in CW Modulation Systems

3\. Pulse Modulation (3 weeks)

第7週 Sampling Process

第8週 Quantization Process

第9週 Midterm Exam

4\. Baseband Pulse Transmission (3 weeks)

第10週 Matched Filter

第11週 Nyquist's Criterion for Distortionless Baseband BinaryTransmission

第12週 Optimum Linear Receiver

5\. Signal-Space Analysis (3 weeks)

第13週Bayes Optimization

第14週 MAP Receiver for Digital Data Transmission

第15週 Estimation Theory

6\. Passband Digital Transmission (3 weeks)

第16週 Passband Transmission Model

第17週 Digital Modulation

第18週 Term Exam
